title: History
content:
History Main Attribute Intelligence

History is a Skill in Baldur's Gate 3. History is an Intelligence skill. Skills represent a specific aspect of an ability score, and an individualâ€™s proficiency in a skill demonstrates a focus on that aspect.

History Information

History is everything you know about Faerun's past, allowing you to recognize notable names and unusual items. It is an Intelligence Skill. Your Intelligence (History) check measures your ability to recall lore about historical even
